article_title: Evidence-Based Practice, Not Tech Unicorns, Will Fix Home Care

article_metadata.description: Written with Dr. Andrey Ostrovsky, HCBS Quality Committee for the National Quality Forum, Pediatrician & Hospitalist at Children's National Health System, CEO & Co-Founder Care at Hand In 2013, Time magazine accurately predicted that the Affordable Care Act (ACA) would be a treasure trove of digital health entrepreneurial activity. While digital health investment had [...]
